鑏鑏鑏

鑏字的基本解释

鑏
níng
刃柄。

鑏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［níng］
［《廣韻》女耕切，平耕，娘。］
(1)铁鑏。
(2)刃柄。
[②]［nǐng］
［《集韻》乃挺切，上迥，泥。］
装刀柄的部位。

鑏字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鑏； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1325第08
【廣韻】女耕切【集韻】尼耕切，?音儜。【廣韻】鐵鑏。【集韻】刃柄。　又【集韻】乃挺切，音?。吳俗謂刀柄入處爲鑏。

鑏字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鑏字的起名意思

暂无。

Yin
Basic explanation of words
Yin
níng
Blade handle.
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［níng］
["Guangyun" female ploughing cut, flat ploughing, mother. ]
(1) Tiefa.
(2) The blade handle.
[②]［nǐng］
["Jiyun" is quite cut, on the singular, and muddy. ]
The part where the handle is installed.
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　鑏; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1325 Page 08
[Guang Yun] Female Gengqie [Jiyun] Ni Gengqie,? The sound is 儜. [Guang Yun] Tie Liu. 【Jiyun】The handle of the blade.　[Jiyun] It’s pretty cut, the sound?. Wu Su said that the entrance of the hilt is a scorpion.
